title: Head Scarf
description: pink and tan; 5/8\"-1\" bands of different woven patterns separated by black and tan woven strips; 4\"-4-1/2\" warp fringe at each end; fringe knotted at very end
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
